name: Staff of Flowing Water
active: Rapids: Healing or shielding an ally grants both of you 35 Ability Power and 15% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.
tips: Staff of Flowing WaterEnhance allies Ability Power and Ability Haste +100 Max Health +45 Ability Power +350 Max Mana +10 Ability Haste +8% Heal and Shield StrengthRapids: Healing or shielding an ally grants you both +10  Ability Haste and 20-40  (based on target's level) Ability Power for 6 seconds.

2500


This item is perfect for champions who rely on healing or shielding abilities to support their team.
It provides bonuses to maximum health, ability power, maximum mana, ability haste, and amplifies healing and shielding effects.
The "Rapids" effect activates when you heal or shield an ally, granting both you and your ally bonuses to ability haste and ability power for 6 seconds.
This item is especially useful for champions who actively support their team, such as Soraka, Nami, or Lulu.
